articles.description: ROYAL weddings are always a national event in the UK, and millions tune in to watch the celebrations live. So how old were members of the Royal Family when they got married?

articles.author: Sameer Suri
articles.title: Chadwick Boseman's last film Ma Rainey's Black Bottom officially released on Netflix - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chadwick Boseman's final  movie Ma Rainey's Black Bottom bowed on Netflix Friday. The Black Panther lead died this August at the age of 43 after secretly struggling against colon cancer for four years.
articles.content:

articles.author: Roxy Simons
articles.title: Taylor Swift's surprise album Evermore tops UK's Official Albums Chart - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer, 31, became the first musician in four years to hold the spot with two different albums in one calendar year, it was announced on Friday.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift has claimed the Number 1 spot on the UK's Official Albums Chart with her ninth studio release Evermore, it was announced on Friday.
